CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.transformation_metarule AS SELECT tm.id, s.name AS service, tm.sequence_number, rm.name AS resource_map, bm.name AS entity_map, bnr.name AS entity_network_resource, tm.stop_on_match FROM ruleform.transformation_metarule tm JOIN ruleform.entity s ON tm.service = s.id JOIN ruleform.relationship rm ON tm.resource_map = rm.id JOIN ruleform.relationship bm ON tm.entity_map = bm.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.resource bnr ON tm.entity_network_resource = bnr.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.transformation_metarule OWNER TO core;
